Articles.Content: hay, im sure ive put mods in wrong places, when i go into build, theres nothing at all there to build with. i deleted all local content from steam and reinstalled, but ive still got the problem. is there a way to fix this?
done it, i deleted all local content via steam, but it doesnt delete it lol. so i had delete it manually then reinstall. derp.
Uh, this doesn't seem like a mod's fault. It appears you have messed up the "Squad" gamedata folder or something like that. Not sure if this is right with steam though, because I don't use Steam.

A stock install should have only the Squad folder in GameData. Mods go into GameData (Most have the GameData folder already, in which case just merge them) if it doesn't it goes into GameData and nowhere else.
